summary: The project manager opened the meeting by stating the agenda and then introduced the upcoming project to the team members. The team members then participated in an exercise in which they each drew their favorite animal and discussed why they liked the particular animal. The project manager briefed the team on the production and selling costs of the remote they are to create. The project manager also briefed the team on the profit aim and discussed how many remotes must be sold in order to reach the profit aim of 50 million Euro. The team then discussed their experiences using remote controls and what features in terms of functionality and appearance to consider in making the remote.
actions: The industrial designer will work on the working design. The user interface designer will work on the technical functions design. The marketing expert will work on the user requirements specification
decisions: The remote will be sold for 25 Euro. Production costs cannot exceed 12.50 Euro.
problems: Whether the mark-up reflected in the selling price is normal.

pens.ocr_transcript:
Project Licence

Selling price:             25 euro
profit aim:           50 M euro   ( international)
production costs:   max 12.50 euro

User Interface Designer. Responsible for:
- in the functional design phase  : technical function design
- conceptual                                   : user interface concept
- detailed                                        : user interface design

Phase 1:   technical function: change channels, volume, setstop/
                         or television.
Take inspiration from other remote controls but improve on them: combine looks and shape of eg 'jazz' with function ... -en lime buttons, only necessary functions

Phase 2:   stay user friendly buttons. Small indents, smooth.
                      easy to feel.
                      Hard plastic exterior with softer buttons.
pens.ocr_description:
The image contains handwritten notes that outline different aspects of a project license related to product design and production. Here's a transcription of the notes:

---

Project License

Selling price: 25 euro
Profit Aim: 50 M euro (international)
Production costs: max 12.50 euro

User Interface Designer Responsibilities:
- In the functional design phase: technical function design
- Conceptual: user interface concept
- Detailed: user interface design

Phase 1:
- Technical function: change channels, volume, settings on television.
- Take inspiration from other remote controls but improve on them: combine idea concepts of e.g. iPod with function, apply necessary functions only to buttons.
- easy to feel.

Phase 2:
- Using user-friendly buttons. Small in size, sturdy, easy to feel.
- Hard plastic exterior with softer buttons.

---

These notes appear to discuss the pricing, cost management, and design responsibilities and phases for developing a user interface, specifically for a remote control. The focus is on creating a functional, user-friendly, and cost-effective product.
